core.Customer

    • Uses of Customer in controller

      Methods in controller that return types with arguments of type Customer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Customer> IFly.getCustomers() 
      java.util.Map<Agent,java.util.List<Customer>> IFly.getPotentialCustomersForAgents()
      potential customers for Agents is a customer who lives in the same city where Agent lives but the customer never ordered from the agent.
      java.util.Map<Branch,java.util.List<Customer>> IFly.getPotentialCustomersForBranch()
      Retrieve Refugees - Potential customer for branch is a customer how lives in a city where IFly owns a branch but the customer never bought from it.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FlightOrder.FlightTicket FlightOrder.addTicket(Customer passanger, int seat, int row, java.lang.String classType)
      The role of this method is to add a new ticket to the tickets set You need to check if the specific place {seat and row} (not by equals method) is available in this flight by checking all the flight tickets associates with this flight.
